name: Adventure Time™: ETDBIDK
description: Princess Bubblegum summons Finn and Jake to the Candy Kingdom to investigate a rash of thefts and kidnappings that have plagued her kingdom. She thinks the cause lies within her Secret Royal Dungeon, where only the nastiest monsters and criminals are locked up. If they’ve found a way to escape, the Land of Ooo will be in danger! Game Features: - Play as fan-favorite Adventure Time characters - An all-new story and adventure from series creator! - Play solo or grab your friends for four-player, co-operative multiplayer! - BMO appears on the GamePad with over 300 unique voice clips to help the player! - Conquer a massive, 100 floor dungeon! - Find and equip Tokens for awesome ability boosts and Sub-Weapons to complement your attacks.
